response.original_title: A Short Story in the Eyes of Hope
response.overview: This animation centres around photographs of the artist's father, Abdulhussain Kwaish. The text describes different moments in his life, from his time in the army to a period living impoverished with unrealised dreams. Overlaying the film are the traditional burial prayers sung during Abdulhussain's funeral in Al-Najaf, a holy city in Iraq with the world's largest cemetery.
response.title: A Short Story in the Eyes of Hope
